source.author: by Bernice Yeung and Michael Grabell
source.title: After Hundreds of Meatpacking Workers Died From COVID-19, Congress Wants Answers

exampleSentences.sentence: The meat companies’ employees, many of them immigrants and refugees, slice pig bellies or cut up chicken carcasses in close quarters.

source.author: Aaron Pressman
source.title: Who is Intel’s new CEO, Pat Gelsinger

exampleSentences.sentence: Growing up on a farm in an Amish part of rural Pennsylvania, he woke up before dawn to care for pigs and cows.

source.author: Bruce Bower
source.title: One of the oldest known cave paintings has been found in Indonesia

exampleSentences.sentence: It’s a painting of a warty pig, an animal still found on Sulawesi, that was rendered on the cave’s back wall at least 45,500 years ago, researchers report January 13 in Science Advances.
I talked to a woman who nursed an injured baby pig back to health.

source.author: Theresa Vargas
source.title: At the end of an isolating year, even the embarrassing, frustrating, weird parts of family gatherings feel missed

exampleSentences.sentence: I’m also guessing most people haven’t found themselves sitting in the back seat of a car, in charge of making sure a massive raw pig didn’t roll onto the floor.

source.author: Katie McLean
source.title: Gene editing has made pigs immune to a deadly epidemic

exampleSentences.sentence: The 2009 H1N1 swine flu carried viral elements from birds, pigs, and humans.

source.author: Tim Carman
source.title: The McRib is back at McDonald’s, and after a taste, I still don’t get its cult appeal

exampleSentences.sentence: As most Americans have known for decades, a real McRib features no bones at all, whether from God, a pig or Adam himself.

source.author: by James Bandler, Patricia Callahan, Sebastian Rotella and Kirsten Berg
source.title: Inside the Fall of the CDC

exampleSentences.sentence: Just months after President Barack Obama took office, a novel flu jumped from pigs to people, then spread across the nation.

source.author: Shelly Fan
source.title: Neuralink’s Wildly Anticipated New Brain Implant: the Hype vs. the Science

exampleSentences.sentence: It’s feasible that the pigs could be trained on more complicated tests and behaviors to show that the implant is affecting their movements, preferences, or judgment.

source.author: David Rotman
source.title: Elon Musk’s Neuralink is neuroscience theater

exampleSentences.sentence: The implant Neuralink is testing on its pigs has 1,000 channels and is likely to read from a similar number of neurons.
